In England, in the seven days to 05 June, there were 28,299 new confirmed cases (50.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 29 May, there were 18,348 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 54% (9,951 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 10 June is 3,962,371 (7,039.6 cases per 100,000 population).
